participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Hey team :wave: have we conducted any tests against other OCR providers vs. MSFT ocr? BofA is looking for some numbers or proof that MSFT ocr is better and Abbyy, Google Vision or any other ocr providers. They are looking for any info we have on why we suggest using MSFT ocr.

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.message: I don't think we have any formalized, it's always just been so obviously better that we never really bothered.
We can try to put something together that can formally presented to them, i saw the email where they were requesting justification for using msft ocr
what exactly do you think something like this would look like?

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: I think we should show some examples of low quality documents and what the output looks like with abbyy and with MSFT

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: maybe some sort of document with some handwriting and text on it ran through Abbyy, Google Vision, and MSFT
